entry.title: We're Moving! Free Shipping In the GTA!
entry.content:
While walking down Spadina Avenue, you may have noticed that the 22 year iconic Ace Gifts Boutique is no longer there! Unfortunately the building has been sold and we've been unexpectedly forced to relocate!

We apologize for the inconvenience. Please excuse us while we're moving to our new Scarborough location (details to be announced in the coming months).

In the meantime, to make it up to our customers, we are offering courtesy FREE SHIPPING anywhere in Ontario. The discount is automatically added to your cart.

For personalized assistance please email us at sales@acegiftsplus.ca or call us at 416 977 6181 and we will do our best to accommodate your rush orders for same day pickup.

We thank you for your loyalty and understanding during this transition.

G. Kalra

President, Ace Gifts Plus Inc.
